plot: In order to be taken seriously as a mad scientist and gain entrance into the Mad Scientist Guild, Dr. Lester must create a monster horrific enough to scare today's jaded youth.
title: Zompire! Dr. Lester's Monster
plot_es: In order to be taken seriously as a mad scientist and gain entrance into the Mad Scientist Guild, Dr. Lester must create a monster horrific enough to scare today's jaded youth.
plot_en: In order to be taken seriously as a mad scientist and gain entrance into the Mad Scientist Guild, Dr. Lester must create a monster horrific enough to scare today's jaded youth.
